name: stock_v2_get_price_fair_value
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ms_finance.
Tool description: This API helps to query financial summary, stocks, quotes, movers, news, etc... to create a site/application such as morningstar.com
API description: Fetches the price vs fair value data for a given stock.

performanceid.description: The performance ID of the stock. This value can be obtained from endpoints such as /auto-complete, /get-summary, or /get-movers.
